text: @SpaceX @realDonaldTrump So you just mosey on back in the WH & change the subject? Like you didn’t just gas peaceful protestors for a photo op? 100,000+ Americans are dead from COVID19.  Do you realize it didn’t magically go away?  This is not leadership.
